FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Research Labs
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: Scienctists spend their days researching here. +.5 base research production.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Indoor Hydroponics
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: Food is produced indoors, protecting it from the harshes from the world. +.5 base food production.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Firearms Factory
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A factory that produces mass quantities of firearms. +.5 base weapon production.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Rimazon Warehouse
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A warehouse stocked full of goods marked to be shipped. +20 tithe modifier, +5% base tax.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: In-House Merc Company
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: Barracks for an in-house mercenary company. They will provide security for the colony. +1 military level, -10% tax.

FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.label: Adult Entertainment Centre
FactionColonies.FCTraitEffectDef.desc: A place for the local people to spend a dime and have a good time. +.5 base happiness a day.
